name: Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette
about: What it is: A smoky, cool-toned palette of wearable and versatile shades, including a black eye gloss and sparkly blacks and silvers, with finishes that range from matte nudes to multi-chromatic foils...Ingredient Callouts: Free of parabens, formaldehydes, formaldehyde-releasing agents, phthalates, mineral oil, retinyl palmitate, oxybenzone, coal tar, hydroquinone, sulfates SLS & SLES, triclocarban, triclosan, and contains less than one percent synthetic fragrance. It is also cruelty-free...What Else You Need to Know: This 18-well eyeshadow palette is packed with ultra-pigmented shades and innovative texturesu2014all you need to create an everyday look, a grunge vibe, or sultry siren eyesu2014with minimal fallout. Define your lower lash lines with metallics or use the black gloss to create the ultimate grunge eye...This Palette Contains:.- 18 x 0.59oz/ 16.8 g Eyeshadows in Liberty (burnt peach matte), Heroine (light peach matte), Avant-Garde (deep-black and gold-powder metallic), Renegade (ultra-black, creamy metallic), Brave (mauve matte), Beauty Chaos (lilac matte), Rise Up (neutral brown matte), Stand Up (copper-powder metallic), Strong AF (silver-black/purple, creamy marble metallic), Nirvana (eggplant-brown matte), Hope (deep, neutral brown matte), Haphazard (multichromatic shimmer drops), Fearless (purple-brown matte), Luv Anarchy (taupe matte), Maverick (creamy silver metallic), Rebelle (multichromatic shimmer flakes), Freedom (purple-gray matte), Grunge (black eye gloss)..Palette Size: 4.09w x 6.81d x 0.59h (full size)
ingredients: Liberty, Heroine, Brave, Beauty Chaos, Rise Up, Nirvana, Fearless, Hope, and Luv Anarchy:.Mica, Oryza Sativa (Rice) Powder, Silica, Magnesium Myristate, Cocoglycerides, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Propanediol, Decylene Glycol, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Magnesium Stearate, C10-18 Triglycerides, 1,2-Hexanediol, Lauroyl Lysine, Caprylhydroxamic Acid. May Contain (+/-) Red 40 Lake/CI 16035, Yellow 5 Lake/CI 19140, Carmine/CI 75470, Ultramarines/CI 77007, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Iron Oxides/CI 77492, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Ferric Ferrocyanide/CI 77510, Manganese Violet/CI 77742, Titanium Dioxide/CI 7789. ..Avant-Garde:.Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Dimethicone, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Zinc Stearate, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Ethylene/Propylene/Styrene Copolymer, Propanediol, Decylene Glycol, Tin Oxide, 1,2-Hexanediol, Butylene/Ethylene/Styrene Copolymer, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Pentaerythrityl Tetra-Di-T-Butyl Hydroxyhydrocinnamate, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891...Renegade:.Silica, Kaolin, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Pentaerythrityl Tetraisostearate, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Dimethicone, Phenyl Trimethicone, Propanediol, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Decylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Black 2/CI 77266 (Nano). ..Stand Up:.Mica, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Dimethicone, Zinc Stearate, Diisostearyl Malate, Octyldodecyl Stearoyl Stearate, Stearyl Dimethicone, Silica, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Tin Oxide, Ethylhexylglycerin, Propanediol, Decylene Glycol, 1,2-Hexanediol, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Iron Oxides/CI 77491, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891. ..Strong AF:.Mica, Hydrogenated Ethylhexyl Olivate, Dimethicone, Synthetic Fluorphlogopite, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, C10-18 Triglycerides, Zinc Stearate, Octyldodecanol, Silica, Cetearyl Ethylhexanoate, Simmondsia Chinensis (Jojoba) Seed Oil, Hydrated Silica, Polybutene, Dodecane, C30-45 Alkyl Dimethicone, Phenylisopropyl Dimethicone, Hydrogenated Vegetable Oil, Triethylhexanoin, Polyhydroxystearic Acid, Sucrose Acetate Isobutyrate, Coconut Alkanes, Hydrogenated Olive Oil Unsaponifiables, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Cetyl PEG/PPG-10/1 Glutamide, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Dibutyl Ethylhexanoyl Glutamide, Propylene Carbonate, Iron Oxides/CI 77499, Titanium Dioxide/CI 77891.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Build your base with the Matte Basics Melted Shadows..-For a metallic finish, use a dense, flat brush..-Use your fingers for a full-coverage foil effect. .-For a pearlescent finish, apply Rebelle to bare lids with your finger or a brush. .-For effortless grunge, apply Grunge to bare lids with your finger or a flat brush...Huda's hack:.-Use your fingers to apply shimmers and metallics for an easy high-impact look..-For more intense mattes, apply with a brush..-For the ultimate grunge: blend, blend, blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: love this palette!! it has all the colors i need!! currently using this one and the icy nude. absolutely in love!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: These colors are so beautiful and pigmented. I get compliments every time I use this pallet. The darks are so rich but blend out so easily. There isnu2019t a lot of fall out when applying either.

reviews.review_title: Must have for going out, etc.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this palette and how you can be creative with it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Oily skin
Green eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: All the colors are sooooooo light. The black isn't black, and it's not opaque. The one silver shimmer is good, but the other shades just aren't giving anything. Also, the balm-y glitter just turned into dust and shriveled up in the pan.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: For the money you would expect NOT to have mold growth on the eyeshadow color. Quality control went way down. Iu2019m not buying their products anymore. Not worth the risk.    Donu2019t waste your money

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s pretty. But the pigment is nothing like the Patrick Ta so I had to return. Felt like I had to pack on to get the pay off I was using with PTMM

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: While maybe not the most versatile palette, I'm glad I got my hands on it. Usually spangly silver shades are too cool and blue for me to wear since I hate a frosty look, and the silvers in this palette all have some slightly different tint that pulls them away from pure blue-silver. Cant really speak for that glossy black shade  but it might be good for a very grungy look since it looks like it doesn't really set down by itself. Kind of same-y, so if you don't like gothy and not fully cool-toned looks then it's probably not for you.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is crazy beautiful. Pictures don't do justice to the pink and light shades. They're absolutely gorgeous. Many looks can be made with this variety, definitely more than just a grundgey smokey eye. I was a little worried it would get messed up in shipping or have the scuzz problems other people have talked about, but it came in perfect condition. I'm giving my sister all of my eyeshadow palettes and sticking with this one ud83dudda4

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, red hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Amazing product. I'm just shy of 60 and spent most of this day crying at a funeral, and this shadow held up beautifully.  I have only re-applied lip colour today, so excuse the not so great pic. Just proving the point. Huda is worth the price!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Finally, a cool toned palette!! If you want something that isn't warm, that is a good steal for your money, all the shades in here are STUNNING!!!! This palette has the most beautiful shimmers (Patrick Ta who?). Seriously, this is an amazing deal. Once I hit pan, i would buy this again. Sooooo nice and so happy with this palette...

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I recived the item damaged and i contact the massiger company and waiting for the answer

reviews.review_title: Stunning colors, mattes are long wearing
reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are stunning. The mattes are long wearing and ready to blend. I put a shimmer on with my finger, but that didn't last long through the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Don't let the dark colors scare you away, this is a versatile palette and worth the buy. I am probably intermediate level when it comes to eye makeup skills, and I have gotten several office work appropriate looks out of, in addition to night time looks. Quality is great, as is the case with most Huda shadows. Minimal fall out. I am Fenty 420 and I found that most of the colors can be used in a complimentary way on me, so it is brown girl friendly.

reviews.review_title: now THIS is a staple palette ud83dude0d
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: this palette has had my attention for a YEAR since it released, but I resisted buying it bc no matter how hard brands try to normalize $60+ palettes I just can't get on board, but then it went on 50% off sale & I simply couldn't help myself. luckily, I'm in LOVE w it. I've used it almost every time I've done my makeup for the whole month since I bought it & Ive made a special point to try the cream a bunch of different ways. it's messy but imo it's supposed to be. I do make sure to pick it up w a clean finger or brush every time & I blow the powder shadows away from it after every use bc I don't want it to get gross or start growing anything like I've heard happening w creams in palettes. the mattes are nice & blendable, the shimmers are all different textures, so even the two silvers that appear similar in the pan don't look the same on the lids. overall, a great purchase BUT I knocked off a star for the high price tag. glad I waited for a sale

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, gray hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Colors look beautiful but not risking using this.  The cream shade Grunge appears to have a type of mold on it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Porcelain skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: im emo and this palette is everything i needed. It's perfectly an effortless grunge palette and I actually purchased it because my fiance sent me off to Sephora while he prepared for our engagement, so this was my engagement eyeshadow and I love it so much! i love that I can do natural warm toned looks or something very dramatic for a concert when I get to do full eye makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are what I wanted in a color story, but the formula just wasn't it at ALL. it was super patchy and hard to blend. the only good pigmented shadow was Maverick. other than that, everything had so much fallout and lack of smoothness. and the final black creamy shade was disgusting. it felt like greasy halloween paint and creased like crazy. Returned and exchanged for a different competitor palette with much better formulas.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I was very excited about this product's colors and color names. However, I would not purchase Huda eyeshadow again. Naked pallettes are the way to go for me. Huda does NOT last...it creases right away and looks awful by the end of the day. It was a very disappointing purchase. For the price it should be of higher quality. Do not recommend.

reviews.review_title: I will figure this puzzle out someday.
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, brunette hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I have no idea what on earth to do with half of the colors in the pallette!  therefore it's just sitting around in my vanity, barely touched because I refuse to let it break me!  it cost too much to ignore and I can't send it back because I have a weird fascination for it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are unique and glide on well. It's my go to palette. Some of the metallic don't work for my skin tone but love the other colors. Colors are as expected too.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: What a fun palette. Do not pass this over because it seems dark and brooding. The glitter, shimmers, and shine are absolutely eye catching. The mattes apply with ease and layer beautifully. You can create a nude everyday look or an all out garage grunge girl look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have yet to meet a Huda eyeshadow palette that I don't love and this one is no exception. The Strong AF is my go to main color now and I have received so many compliments.  It's truly a great palette that can be subtle or wow, depending on your mood.  Versatility is key for me and I take this palette with me on trips for that very reason.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was unsure if I should purchase this palette but ultimately I am happy I did!  The color range is excellent and each shade is wearable.  I can do everyday looks and add shimmers for nighttime.  I often wear shadow liner, and the black shade in this palette is very long wearing as an eyeliner, even when it is not set with a liquid on top. The black cream shadow also blends well but doesnu2019t budge when it dries down. I took a star off because the matte shades have more fallout than Iu2019m used to.  They can be a little messy to work with on the eye and they dust up the palette. They still provide enough pigment and I can work with them though.

reviews.review_title: meh: fallout everywhere, creasing, wearing off
reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is my first Huda purchase and I'm bummed. I LOVE the color story, everything goes on pigmented and smooth and lush, but there is SO MUCH FALLOUT. Even if it is my brushes, it's way more than any of my other palettes from assorted other brands. The black powder, in particular, is TERRIBLE at getting absolutely everywhere, and impossible to get off once it does. It just smears. The other day I got home from work and had black eyeshadow dapples all along one cheek. No idea how. It doesn't stay in place once you put it on even if you DO manage to clean up all the fallout. The other colors crease or wear off pretty quickly. The glitters seem to have decent staying power, though. Overall, I love the colors, I love how pigmented they are and how smoothly they go on and blend, but they can't last through a work day and have crazy fallout. If I'm paying this much, I'll stick with Natasha Denona.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Madly in love with this palette! My first Huda palette and completely worth it! The pigments are insane and the glitter shadows last forever! I donu2019t use it on daily basis but yes for night events :)

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: As always Huda delivers! Love it! Still working through the colors!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The grunge area of the 90s was my era and I love this pallete! It also has some balm shades too!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, lightMedium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: Terrible in every way! The smell is strange,the colors were nice but I reacted to it and couldnu2019t keep it on! As for the price, it does not justify the quality!ud83eudd2e

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: After using product, itu2019s long lasting and does not feel heavy on the face. Colors blend very well.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I never thought in a million years, honestly, that I would ever but this Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge pallet ever! I did get it during the VIB Rouge sale and it ended up being $84 after taxes, still very expensive but it was actually an Eid gift from my parents and I am so happy I did. I love the colors, incredible pigment and both the matte and shimmer both amazing LOVE Huda

reviews.review_buyer_description: red hair, Fair skin tone
reviews.review_text: I received this Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette to try out and review in exchange for my honest opinion complimentary from HUDA BEAUTY. I think some of the colors in this palette seem pretty however, when the palette arrived it was pretty damaged and around half of the shades were broken and made a mess in the palette, plus the palette also does not close due to the part thatu2019s supposed to help it stay shut being broken, so I think that may be also been why half the shades arrived broken. It wasnu2019t easy to evaluate the quality of the palette accurately due to this.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Disclaimer: This is not a cool toned palette. Maybe two of the mattes are cool on my complexion, and the others are neutral to warm. I would describe this as a staple neutral matte palette that has the addition of extra dark shades and a few silver shimmers. Two of the shimmers are more like sequin shades where the shimmer particles blend away on the eye, so most of the shades are effectively mattes. It only counts as cool for Huda, since most of their other palettes are orange and warm berry tones. I also would not purchase this as your main standalone palette, because the shimmer options are limited.   That said, I knew all of this going in from other reviews, and I'm very happy with the palette. Two of my staple matte palettes were expiring, and this is a good replacement with a transition shades in a variety of undertones. I use it as a companion palette with the more exciting shimmers in palettes like Rose Quartz as well as my indie shimmer singles.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, mediumTan skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This is the third Huda Beauty palette Iu2019ve purchased and Iu2019m absolutely in love with it as per usual! It blends beautifully. The glitters are gorgeous and there are many looks that can be created.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, fairLight skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Itu2019s a nice palette for those who really like to achieve smoky eyes daily. Otherwise, itu2019s not worth it. There are a few shades for neutral looks but the colors are not as nice as the dark metallic ones.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Dark skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow pallette is even more beautiful than the picture. Each formula is stunning, the pigment is great and they blend so easily ... Buy it..

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, mediumTan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The colors in This pallet go on buttery smooth and blend like a dream. I particularly like the color choices. Iu2019ve been doing a new look every day, and I honestly feel completely transformed. I donu2019t know exactly why this palette looks so good on me that it seems to have transformed my face and eye shape, but it does! I can tell that this palette is going to keep me busy with a ton of looks for a long time and Iu2019m super excited! It doesnu2019t matter if this is your only palette or if you already have a ton, like me, itu2019s a total staple!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I came for the fun, grunge-aesthetic of this palette, but I stayed for the neutrals. You can have all the dark, moody fun you want with this, but it also delivers in every other way: easy, natural (cool and warm-toned) daytime looks, soft glam, Y2K vibes with those stunning, buttery silver glitters... it really is a do-it-all palette. Downsides? Glitter everywhere upon attempted removal. But that's a downside to glitter, not the palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, red hair, lightMedium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: The packaging and color selection made me purchase it, took me back to my Smokey stage that I miss with plenty of mattes to smoke out, with other options of glitter formulas that work together to create evening looks glam!

reviews.review_title: Go-To Palette for 90u2019s Pam Anderson Smokey Eye
reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brown hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love how many different Smokey looks you can create but I had a hard time blending the black cream shadow with the eyeshadows. Not a big deal for me bc that cream shadow made a beautiful eyeliner!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: I received the Pretty Grunge eyeshadow palette in exchange for my honest review. The palette has a great range of shades that are all highly pigmented and feel buttery soft. I like how easy it is to use the shades for a more everyday look and for a more bold look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, auburn hair, Porcelain skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I normally don't go for this color scheme, but this eyeshadow palette had me intrigued, and, honestly, I am glad it is part of my collection now because it's quite unique and amazing. Don't be afraid of the darker colors! They are so workable. The shades are wearable, blend effortlessly, are pigmented and long-lasting. There is a nice range of formulas, from shimmers to metallics, mattes, or chromes that work well together. You can create so many looks with this one, it's such a versatile product.

reviews.review_title: A Versatile Palette for Stunning Eye Looks
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette by Huda Beauty is a must-have for any makeup enthusiast. As a fan of Huda Beauty products, I was excited to try this palette, and I have to say, it exceeded my expectations. One of the standout features of this palette is its versatility. It includes a beautiful range of shades, from soft neutrals to bold metallics, allowing you to create a variety of stunning eye looks. Whether you're going for a natural daytime look or a dramatic evening look, this palette has you covered. The eyeshadows in this palette are highly pigmented and blend effortlessly, making them easy to work with. The texture is smooth and buttery, and the shadows apply evenly without any patchiness. The lasting power is also impressive, with the colors staying vibrant and crease-free throughout the day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, fairLight skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This is the perfect cool toned palette for a classic alternative look. The shadows are super blend able and pigmented. Great to have in a kit for edgy looks.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is a good quality eye shadow set. The purples come out redder than Iu2019d like. But the dark colors and light cream colors are great. For sure thereu2019s about 4 or 5 that I use regularly and colors I will probably never use. Probably thatu2019s true for any of these large shadow sets. But I really itu2019s a good collection.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I love this eyeshadow pallet. It has the perfect range of neutral shades while adding some grey and black to be grungy. The shadows are super opaque and blendable with no fallout. The cream shadows are also amazing!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Having tried the Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette, I must say it's a versatile gem in my makeup collection. The range of shades allows for both subtle day looks and bold night statements. The pigmentation is impressive, offering rich color payoff with minimal fallout. The blendability of the shadows makes it easy to create seamless transitions and intricate eye looks. Whether you're into soft neutrals or daring pops of color, this palette has something for every mood. Overall, it's a must-have for any makeup enthusiast looking to elevate their eyeshadow game.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, brown hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pallet is a work of art. The shimmery/glitter colors are amazing because they are creamy and it looks great in flash. You can use this pallet for an everyday/natural look with the neutral colors. The shimmers add a beautiful pop to any look.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I have never tried Huda beauty's eyeshadow pallets.And honestly I don't know what I was waiting for the formula on these eyeshadow are amazing!!! they are so pigmented and complement so beautifully together.Its definitely a must have

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am very happy with this makeup case, it has a great variety of beautiful shadows that make me look incredible. very easy to carry in a purse. it's perfect for me. excellent product. you can use brushes or fingers.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Huda Beauty PRETTY GRUNGE EYESHADOW PALETTE has a total of 18 highly pigmented shades and textures. From chrome, glossy, shimmery, shiny, matte, and metallics. You can you this palette to for during the day and work wear looks or sultry sexy night on the town looks. How to apply- with your fingers or brush or brushes depending on the look youu2019re going for.  My favorite shades are Rise Up and Stand Up. I wear these to work and during the day. At night it would be Renegade and all metallics and chromes. These donu2019t crease or smudge. They are definitely buildable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Medium skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette has the most beautiful shimmer shades Iu2019ve seen. They go on smooth like butter. They are very pigmented. I love the neutral colors this palette has. I recommend this makeup palette to anyone who likes neutral and bold shades.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Oh this is so amazing and great quality. The shades are so pretty and pigmented. Although it's called grunge there are shades that are very versatile. The metallic one is so soft and gorgeous. I love the outer packaging.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette has a great formula and color range and it goes on like butter. The eye shadows in this are amazing and I love them, but the packaging arrived awful. Two of the shadows were not packed down and had loose pigment everywhere. The clasp to close the palette was broken therefore my palette is always open.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing pallet for creating smoky gorgeous dreamy looks. I love the different types of finishes you get Matt, shimmer, glitter the possibilities are endless! They are super pigmented last all day and totally worth your time.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: This palate is absolutely beautiful. The colors are great and the formula is amazing. It has all the necessary shades, from a soft look to a more glamorous one. It easy to apply and blend. I recommend it.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This Grunge palette is just so gorgeous. The shades are beautiful and can be used in many many ways. The packaging on this is stunning. I love the way the formula blends on the eyes. I would highly recommend

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love this shadow palette that seems very complete to me, it has a lot of variety in texture and very good coverage, I can do my makeup with this shadow in a more natural way or a more intense makeup, I do my makeup with this palette every day.  I definitely recommend it

reviews.review_buyer_description: black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is stunning! The colors are very unique and versatile. I love how this palette can be used for natural looks as well as bold date night out looks. These shadows are so buttery and smooth! They blend out so well. I love that the black shadow is a cream shadow. I like to use it as a liner to finish of my looks.

reviews.review_title: A great pallet for anyone's collection
reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, auburn hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The colors are beautiful and stay on all day with little fall out

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Beautiful eyeshadow palette! The shades are gorgeous and vey flattering, you can create a beautiful everyday look, no makeup makeup look or even smokey eye! From simple to classy and sultry, the shades are very pigmented with no fallout.. Super love it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette blows my other ones out of the water! The wide range of textures and shades from chrome metallics and shiny shimmers to flattering mattes and a creamy gloss is unlike anything I've ever seen, and the effortless blending makes application a breeze no matter your skill level even for someone like me who isn't a makeup pro. Seriously, this palette is all you need to unleash your inner makeup artist or just want to have fun with makeup.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Note: I received the Pretty Grunge Palette for free from Huda Beauty in exchange for my honest review :) Iu2019m absolutely in love with this eyeshadow palette!! The color story matches perfectly with my aesthetic. I love that thereu2019s a mix of sparkly girly colors and darker more u201cedgyu201d shades. I also think this is good value for the number of eyeshadows you get and itu2019s very easy to create complete looks with just this palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Good eyeshadow palette. It is quite unique, some of the shades are different and you donu2019t find them in every palette, especially the glitter ones. Great pigmentation and they look beautiful on the lids.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: This palette has me absolutely hooked!  The colors are stunning, incredibly pigmented, and the matte shades feel like butter. It's the perfect palette for crafting any look you desire. With this addition, my collection feels truly complete!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Gray eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Holy Grunge, Holy Smokes!!  This palette is absolutely STUNNING! Like every single pan of color compliments each other and my eyes. I can subtle to dramatically grunge in minutes. Made for me! The pans are perfectly sized and the colors are so pigmented but buttery soft to blend. No issues! Iu2019m a beginner when it comes to a dramatic eye but with practice Iu2019ll be able to create some super sexy eyes! The pictures do not do this palette justice, even the packaging is rockin! My only small complaint is one pan came damaged from how it was shipped. Easy fix, not worried about it because itu2019s still usable.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The ultimate smoky palette. This is such a great one for everyday looks to bold, dramatic night out looks! The mattes blend effortlessly and the shimmers are really beautiful. My only issue is my palette arrived broken, thankfully not too bad but worth mentioning!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is stunning. I love the packaging, and the neutral color scheme is perfect for everyday and has the glitters for going out. They are pigmented and blend well. It is a nice size, not too big for travel. I am a fan!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: The palette case is hard plastic with a click-snap closure that feels very secure. The text on the case is a reflective mirror which is a nice touch, and the inside of the case lid has a full mirror above the shadows. The shadows are clearly labeled, and they look attractive together in the palette. However, I did have one shadow that came cracked (Rebelle), and Grunge had small bubbles or oily dots that were probably caused by temperature changes. There are some cooler shades on the right side of the palette (such as Beauty Chaos and Freedom), but most shades lean warmer. Although Liberty looked like a pinky mauve to me initially, it showed up a bit orangish on my lids. I used my regular eyeshadow primer before applying, and the shadows were very pigmented. They felt creamy (even though they are mostly powders) and blended well. I used Renegade with an angled brush as a liner. I liked the softer charcoal liner look it created, but I did experience a lot of fallout during application and needed to clean up my under eyes afterwards. The glitter shadows in this palette really stood out to me! I love Stand Up and Maverick which create equally shimmery metallic shades, one of which is more gold and one of which is more silver. Theyu2019re all very glittery, although I found that Avant Garde didnu2019t create as much sparkle as the other glitters in the palette. Iu2019ve been having fun playing around with different looks ranging from pretty, to grunge, to various blends of the two, and look forward to trying more looks with it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: 4.5 I havenu2019t had a darker neutral palette so this is a good addition to my collection. This is a matte heavy palette which I do like but could use a little more shimmer shades. Most of the fallout is on the 3 glitter colors but works better when I use my finger to apply. I find the palette more versatile than I first thought as you can use it for a softer look but can also make a dark smokey look. Enjoyed the formula too easy to blend.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This pallete comes with a wide variety of shades but mostly ranging to very dark colors. However, there is also some beautiful nude colors to help set the look at blend them in. Even better is that you get a few glitters in there which are SO BEAUTIFUL All shades are so easy to set and blend, but some are better packed in with your finger. I definetly see myself doing night out looks with thisd palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: this Huda eye shadow palette is so nice! it sits really nicely on top of my eye lids and it isnu2019t too cakey or heavy. I especially like the colors! I really like the sparkly ones; they really shine and have a great look

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Huda Beauty eyeshadows really truly live up to the hype! And this palette really takes the cake. I love this color story - wonderful cool tones for some full glam smokey eyes, but also plenty of shades to do something a bit more natural. Thereu2019s a few warmer shades thrown in so this palette can work for different skin tones. There is a bit of kickback when you dip your brush in, but that doesnu2019t bother me. I hate when people say kickback is indicative of quality, because it is NOT. Also love the cream shadow in this palette too. I uss it as eyeliner and thereu2019s no raccoon eyes at the end of the day, and I also mix it with the brown shade in this palette to make my own u201cbrow pomade.u201d I just wish there was a cover over the cream shade.   Iu2019m telling you, donu2019t be intimidated by all the dark colors in this palette, because it really is wearable I promise!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this Huda Beauty eyeshadow palette. It is such a beautiful palette and the eyeshadows are so pigmented. They are easy to blend out. Itu2019s perfect for creating a smoky eye look, but also great for a more natural eye look. Love it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Tan skin tone, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The pretty grunge palette is absolutely beautiful!!! Just looking at it is absolutely stunning, so Iu2019m so excited to have it. The shadows are so buttery, smooth and very easy to blend. The shimmers are super pigmented, one swipe literally goes along way, and I love the ones that shift. Some of the shimmers almost feel so silky that it feels like a cream. I absolutely recommend this pallet to anybody and everybody. Itu2019s gorgeous.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, blonde hair, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: There are 5 purple colors on the right of the palette which isnu2019t really obvious from the photos. But those colors make such a beautiful look that lasts all day! The quality of the palette is incredible and this has quickly become my favorite palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love the shades of this eyeshadow palette. I use most of the shades and use it for a nice smoky eye look. Thereu2019s also lighter shades too that can be used in the day time. Itu2019s very pigmented and the shades last all day.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I am obsessed with this palette! Itu2019s quickly become my go to palette. If you are like me and love a good smokey eye, this is the perfectly palette to achieve that. The shades are so pigmented and blend like a dream. With so many different shades you are able to create so many different looks, from simple to date-night, this palette has you covered!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Tan skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I really enjoyed this palette the first look I did was more of an everyday slight Smokey eye look it was really easy to use. I didnu2019t release this came with a black cream shade I used as eyeliner. It isnu2019t super pigmented but you can build it up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: The dark colors in Huda Beautyu2019s Pretty Grunge palette work cohesively to create sharp, intense makeup looks. Each color is highly pigmented and my favorite shades to play around with are Fearless, Nirvana and Stand Up. I LOVE the shimmer shades included and prefer to apply these with my fingers. My eye look did not budge and lasted all night!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge eyeshadow palette is a nice collection of grunge matte shades, shimmer, and chrome foils. I didn't notice any fall out. A very nice formulation, where the matte shades apply smoothly, and pigmented.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I'm absolutely in love with the Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette! The colors are so rich and pigmented, and they blend like a dream. I can create both natural everyday looks and dramatic evening looks with ease. The texture is smooth and buttery, making it effortless to apply and blend. Highly recommended

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Deep skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I dark colors in this palette are absolutely amazing and PERFECT for grunge looks! I had no issues with the mattes and they were easy to blend out. To me the shimmers were the highlight! I received so many compliments when I used this palette!

This palette is absolutely gorgeous! With its diverse range of colors, you can effortlessly create an array of eye-catching looks, from subtle daytime elegance to bold and edgy statements. The paletteu2019s neutral tones are universally flattering, ensuring they complement every complexion with ease. Each shade is not only stunning to look at but also delivers exceptional pigmentation and a smooth, blendable texture. Whether youu2019re a makeup novice or a seasoned pro, the Pretty Grunge palette is a must-have for anyone who appreciates beauty and quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Huda Beauty's Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette is an absolute stunner! From everyday neutrals to bold pops of color, this palette offers a mesmerizing range of shades that inspire creativity. Whether you're going for a soft, romantic look or a sultry, grungy vibe, the possibilities are endless. The colors are not only gorgeous but also incredibly pigmented, gliding on smoothly with each application. Plus, the neutral tones make it versatile enough to complement a variety of skin tones. With its stunning array of shades and impeccable quality, the Pretty Grunge palette is a must-have for any makeup collection.

reviews.review_title: A 90s girls dream!!! You need it!
reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Medium skin tone, Normal skin
reviews.review_text: I honestly don't know how I did not get my hands on this BEAUTIFUL palette sooner! The pigmentation of the shades. The blend ability. The color story. It screams 90s makeup and smoky cool girl eyes! It definitely embodies real grundge makeup that I grew up loving. You actually need to go in with a gentle hand bc the shadows really do work in your favor. Less is more. The colors blend will together and don't get mudy. It's a must-have and a staple in my collection. I'm medium with neutral olive tones, depending on my tan. These shadows performed beautifully. No ugly chalky white cast. Just gorgeous! Look at it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, lightMedium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I absolutely loved this palette the first time I laid my eyes on it. I was a 90u2019s kid, so I love the spin they took on the u201cgrunge looku201d yet im able to use the palette for my everyday use as well. I love the variety and of course Huda is always great quality.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Oily skin
reviews.review_text: The Pretry Grunge Palette is so beautiful! It has cool tones that look amazing on my dark skin. Iu2019m able to do so many different looks with this one palette. They blend so well and are so pigmented. There is even a black eye gloss that Iu2019ve never seen before included in a regular palette before. Itu2019s so beautiful on the eyes.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Fair skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This palette is absolutely stunning!! You can use it for everyday makeup looks or going out makeup. From neutral to Smokey eye looks. Itu2019s absolute perfection. And the foils.. so so pretty. Plus the packaging is gorgeous!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I just received this Huda Beauty Pretty Grunge Eyeshadow Palette and I just think is PERFECT, the  shades are so beautiful, ultra-pigmented and have so interesting textures, I can create beautiful looks with the variety of shades, like a daytime look, clear and fresh or something more deep for a night out, it has all in one, that is why I am so impressed and satisfied with these product.   Is also Long-wearing and  Cruelty-Freeufeff!  Iu2019m in love with this palette u2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0fu2764ufe0f

reviews.review_buyer_description: Green eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was hesitant to purchase because I thought it was meant for Smokey looks, but this is a palette you can use every single day!! Just buy it!!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This eyeshadow palette is perfect for me! The powders apply smoothly and are very pigmented. They also blend together very well and are so complimentary for a stunning night-out eye. A great addition to my makeup collection! I was gifted this product from Huda Beauty in exchange for my honest review!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I was gifted this from Huda Beauty this in exchange for my honest review.  PRETTY GRUNGE EYESHADOW PALETTE  This is most definitely a thing of beauty! made up of 18 ultra-pigmented shades in a variety of textures. They feel very smooth, blend easily with very little fallout even when building up for more intensity.  It includes Chrome Metallics, Mattes, Shimmery and even a Creamy Gloss.  Itu2019s rare l find a palette that l would use all shades in and here it is! With the ability to use in so many combination that actually work together beautifully.  Since creating this posts Iu2019ve been using it most days. The only disappoint l had was it came damaged, the hinges are broken. Which Iu2019m guessing happened during shipping.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love everything Huda beauty. This palette is the perfect palette ever. With such a beautiful combination of shades and the the best formula ever this has become my everyday palette. Suoer pigmented and blendable

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: This is the most stunning eyeshadow palette! It has the perfect colors to complete either an everyday look or an evening look. The colors are pigmented and so easy to blend and use. I also love how there is no fallout.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I love Huda eyeshadow palettes. But this one just won my heart. The colors are amazing! And itu2019s neutral but with a plus. The quality I donu2019t need to say, is great! Easy to blend, easy to apply, lasts longer than usual. I recommend it!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: Looks pretty in the pan, but even better on my face. I made a dramatic look for the club and I have to say I love how it looks. The palette is nice the texture of the shadows and it didnu2019t crease on me! So happy with another Huda palette!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, blonde hair, Light skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Great palette! I love the color ranges - it definitely has a little bit of everything. The formula is really good, it applies very easily and has great pigment too. Would definitely recommend to anyone who is looking to try out a new eyeshadow palette.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: Perfect palette for that Smokey eye look. There is such nice pigment in this palette for all the colors. I received this palette in exchange for a review and ended up loving it. It will definitely be a go to palette for me when i get all glammed up.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Blue eyes, red hair, Dry skin
reviews.review_text: HOLY PIGMENT!! Even the lightest colors in this palette have an absolutely Insane payoff. I donu2019t think Iu2019ve ever used an eyeshadow that is this easy to pick up-you have absolutely got To tap off the excess but itu2019s an incredible bang for your buck.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, black hair, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: What a beautiful palette! Iu2019m an absolute fan of all products Huda Beauty, and this one of the reasons why. The formulas are unique and thereu2019s a nice mix. The color story works really well for simple or complex looks. Such a beautiful release!

reviews.review_buyer_description: Hazel eyes, brunette hair, Medium skin tone, Combination skin
reviews.review_text: I received this palette in exchange for this review. The Huda Beauty Grunge Palette is a versatile collection of shades that effortlessly blend together to create stunning, edgy looks. The palette offers a mix of mattes, shimmers, and metallics, allowing for endless creativity. The pigmentation is top-notch, and the shadows have minimal fallout, making application a breeze. Whether you're going for a bold smokey eye or a subtle everyday look, this palette has you covered.

reviews.review_buyer_description: Brown eyes, Light skin tone, Oily skin
